content.title: Introduction to Java
content.note: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible...

quiz.question: What is the main method signature in Java?

content.title: Variables and Data Types
content.note: In Java, there are different types of variables, for example, int, char, float, etc...

quiz.question: Which data type is used to create a variable that should store text?
